mapper.select: SELECT user.id AS id, phone_number AS "phoneNumber", password, name, sex, is_driver AS "isDriver", model, price, driving_age AS "drivingAge", city AS location, head_potrait AS "headPotrait", user_level AS "userLevel", active AS "isActive" FROM user LEFT JOIN location ON location_id = location.id WHERE user.id = #{id}

SELECT user.id AS id, phone_number AS "phoneNumber", password, name, sex, is_driver AS "isDriver", model, price, driving_age AS "drivingAge", city AS location, head_potrait AS "headPotrait", user_level AS "userLevel", active AS "isActive" FROM user LEFT JOIN location ON location_id = location.id WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (phone_number, password, name, sex, is_driver, model, price, driving_age, location_id, head_potrait, user_level, active) VALUES (#{phoneNumber}, #{password}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{isDriver}, #{model}, #{price}, #{drivingAge}, #{locationId}, #{headPotrait}, #{userLevel}, #{isActive})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, is_driver = #{isDriver}, model = #{model}, price = #{price}, driving_age = #{drivingAge}, location_id = #{locationId}, head_potrait = #{headPotrait}, user_level = #{userLevel}, active = #{isActive} WHERE id = #{id}
